description: The 21-year-old star proved he isn't afraid to take risks when it comes to his ever-changing style as he swept his bleach blonde locks into a small ponytail atop his head.
title: Justin Bieber ties his bleach blonde mane into a ponytail at Bryson Tiller concert
title_page: Justin Bieber ties his bleach blonde mane into a ponytail at Bryson Tiller concert | Daily Mail Online
text:
He's adopted an edgier new style since making his musical comeback.
And Justin Bieber debuted quite the outlandish hairstyle when he rocked up to Bryson Tiller's concert at the Wiltern theater in Los Angeles on Thursday evening.
The 21-year-old star proved he isn't afraid to take risks when it comes to his ever-changing style as he swept his bleach blonde locks - which looked to have been lightened - into a small ponytail atop his head.
Scroll down for video
Edgy: Justin Bieber debuted quite the outlandish hairstyle when he rocked up to Bryson Tiller's concert at the Wiltern theater in Los Angeles on Thursday evening
The Sorry hitmaker cut a relaxed figure all round though, as he modeled a chunky knitted sweater, which boasted black and white stripes and a sizable hood, beneath which he occasionally hid his new hairstyle.
Justin paired the over-sized jumper with somewhat loose-fitting cream trousers and plimsoll trainers in a similar shade as he sauntered into the gig alongside a male companion.
Unable to go anywhere without pocketing fan attention, the star waved at some of his admirers before continuing to chat with his friends on his way into the young rapper's gig.
See Justin Bieber updates as he ties his bleach blonde mane into a daring ponytail
Brave: The 21-year-old star proved he isn't afraid to take risks when it comes to his ever-changing style as he swept his bleach blonde locks into a small ponytail atop his head
Laid-back: The Sorry crooner cut a relaxed figure all round, as he modeled a chunky knitted sweater, which boasted black and white stripes and a sizable hood, beneath which he occasionally hid his new hairstyle
Justin wasn't the only A-lister at the intimate concert however, as Kylie Jenner was also seen a strutting into the venue with her girlfriends.
The stylish 18-year-old was clad in an all leather ensemble, comprised of a sleeveless, belted blouse and tight trousers, as she prepared to party the night away.
The reality star - who is in a relationship with Rack City rapper Tyga - looked to have approved of Bryson's performance as she left the venue with a beaming smile on her face and in seemingly high spirits.
Hey, there! Unable to go anywhere without pocketing fan attention, the star waved at some of his admirers before continuing to chat with his friends on his way into the young rapper's gig
Signature style: Justin paired the over-sized jumper with somewhat loose-fitting cream trousers and plimsoll trainers in a similar shade as he sauntered into the gig alongside a male companion
The event came the night after the Confident crooner partied at the same hot-spot, The Nice Guy club, as the teen's older sister Kourtney Kardashian, who is rumoured to have enjoyed a brief 'fling' with last year.
But while celebrities staggering out of nightclubs is hardly a rarity, Justin showed off his kinder side as he stopped to help a stricken bicyclist in Hollywood in the early hours of Thursday.
The singing sensation showed no hesitation in jumping from his giant luxury SUV at a main intersection into the street to check on the fallen rider.
